items.title: How to vibe-write a country hit
items.summary: You may not even know it, but you've almost certainly encountered songs made mostly or even entirely with AI. If you've scrolled on TikTok the last few weeks, you've probably heard "I Run" a few times, but there are countless others making their way around social and music platforms. AI tools in geâ€¦

items.title: 'A Mourinho move' - Prior defends McCullum after criticism
items.summary: Former England wicketkeeper Matt Prior says Brendon McCullum's "over-prepared" comment was a "Mourinho move", taking the spotlight off England's players following their defeat to Australia in the second Ashes Test.

items.title: Honor Win series leaks ahead of imminent launch
items.summary: Honor was expected to launch its GT 2 series gaming phones soon, but there seems to be a slight change of plans. According to a well-known tipster Digital Chat Station, the Honor GT series will actually be called the Honor Win series. The change is already reflected in a JD.com listing, and we now â€¦

items.title: This $549 Acer gaming laptop is simply unbeatable value with Nvidia RTX 5050 GPU and 16GB RAM â€” rival model also on sale for $50 more, featuring AMD Ryzen CPU and 1200p display
items.summary: There's a huge discount on two Acer Nitro V gaming laptops right now with one of Nvidia's latest GeForce RTX GPUs, starting from an impossible-to-beat $549.

items.title: Edwards to face PFL champion Van Steenis in March
items.summary: Britain's Fabian Edwards will face Costello van Steenis for the PFL middleweight title in Madrid on 20 March.

items.title: A presidential refresher on wireless terminology, courtesy of Trump Mobile
items.summary: Next-gen wireless technology for dummies. Where's the Trump Phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump Phone's whereabouts. As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, we're publishing a little reminder of some wireâ€¦

items.title: This Tetris-playing watch struggles with the one thing it should be great at
items.summary: The Tetris: My Play Watch may look like an Apple Watch, but it eschews most of the functionality you'll typically find on a smartwatch to focus on two things: playing Tetris and celebrating the game through a UI that's thoroughly Tetris-themed. It's very good at making you want to play Alexey Pajitâ€¦

This model follows the formula set by the previous R-series models, which is to be the halfway point between the flagship and the mid-range devices. items.summary: Carlos-Manuel Vesga as Manousos. The theme of this week is isolation. items.title: 'Nancy exposed to brutal life as Celtic manager as cup final looms'
items.summary: BBC Scotland's chief sportswriter, Tom English, dissects Wilfried Nancy's start as Celtic manager with the Premier Sports Cup final looming.

items.title: 'Nancy exposed to brutal life as Celtic manager as cup final looms'
items.summary: BBC Scotland's chief sportswriter, Tom English, dissects Wilfried Nancy's start as Celtic manager with the Premier Sports Cup final looming.

items.title: Is Saka an alternative to Haaland as captain? The FPL talking point
items.summary: With Premier League leaders Arsenal hosting bottom club Wolves, is it time to captain Bukayo Saka in your fantasy football team? Our FPL experts give their views.

items.title: More details about the Motorola Edge 70 Ultra leak
items.summary: Motorola's Edge 70 line won't be complete until the company launches the Edge 70 Ultra, which leaked in the image you can see below earlier this month. It was already clear that it would be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC thanks to an earlier Geekbench run, and today some more details â€¦

items.title: Battocletti bids to retain European Cross Country title - watch on BBC
items.summary: Team GB and NI select strong squad for Championships, shown across the BBC this weekend.

items.title: 'There can only be one singer' - my secrets of successful man-management
items.summary: In his BBC Sport column, ex-Premier League boss Tony Pulis looks at man-management and how dealing with unhappy players is not the only challenge a manager will face.

items.title: Rooney 'got death threats' after making Man Utd move
items.summary: Former England striker Wayne Rooney says he received death threats when he made the move from boyhood club Everton to Manchester United in 2004.

items.title: From first-class cricketer to relationship expert on reality TV
items.summary: How a former first-class cricketer from New Zealand became one of television's most recognisable personalities.

items.title: Apple is working on a new AirTag and a new HomePod mini
items.summary: Just as Xiaomi is rumored to be getting into the tracker business, Apple is working on upgrading its AirTag. The new AirTag was apparently supposed to come out this year, but was quietly pushed to the first half of 2026. When it arrives, it will bring with it an improved pairing process, enhanced Pâ€¦

items.title: You cannot blame players for leaving Wales - Hook
items.summary: Former Wales fly-half James Hook says players should not be blamed for leaving Welsh rugby as Dewi Lake and Jac Morgan consider moving to Gloucester from Ospreys.

items.title: Moto G (2026) is now available in the US and Canada
items.summary: Motorola made the Moto G (2026) official in early November, and today the phone has become available in the US and Canada via Motorola's own online store. [#InlinePriceWidget,14138,1#] You can grab one for $199.99 in the US and CAD 299.99 in Canada. The US has both the Pantone Slipstream and Pantonâ€¦

items.title: Here's how many members vivo's V70 family is rumored to have
items.summary: The vivo V70 was recently certified on its way to the Indian market, as was the V70 Lite before it. But these won't be the only members of the V70 family according to a new rumor. Instead, they will allegedly be joined by the V70 Elite and V70 FE. And that's it, those are the four - no Pro, Pro+, oâ€¦

items.title: Tomb Raider announces two new games
items.summary: While Geoff Keighley had already announced that Tomb Raider would be making a Game Awards appearance, the surprise was that instead of one game announcement there's two. Crystal Dynamics and Amazon Game Studios are releasing two Tomb Raider games back-to-back in 2026 and 2027. First up, coming in 2â€¦

items.title: Honor X8d is official with a big battery and a 4G-only chipset
items.summary: Despite not being officially announced, the Honor X8d is now listed in Kyrgyzstan. It currently shows as out of stock, but that will undoubtedly change soon. Unfortunately this means we can't tell you the price, but we do have the specs along with the official images you can see below. So, the Honoâ€¦

items.title: You can now control the DJI Neo 2 with your Apple Watch
items.summary: The DJI Neo 2 drone was launched internationally in November, and today a new update lets you control the drone entirely from your Apple Watch. This works with the Apple Watch Series 8 and later, as well as the Apple Watch Ultra 2 and Ultra 3. The new DJI Neo 2 firmware, which unlocks this functionâ€¦
